Material used.Description: Neuroblastoma cells were transfected with normal or mutant alpha-synuclein

Readout description.Result Description: Downregulation of GTP cyclohydrolase, sepiapterin reductase, and tyrosine hydroxylase
Downregulation of GTP cyclohydrolase, sepiapterin reductase, and tyrosine hydroxylase

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple independent experiments with neuroblastoma cell lines

Technical replicates.Description: Microarray data confirmed by quantitative RT-PCR

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein expression as positive control

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells as negative control

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for gene expression comparison

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Gene expression levels above 1.5-fold compared to wild-type

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Gene expression levels below 0.5-fold compared to wild-type
